typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Detalle Orden} as integer,
		{Numero Orden} as string,
		{Producto ID} as integer,
		{Linea Total} as double,
		Cantidad as integer,
		Descuento as double,
		{Precio Unitario} as double,
		Ganancia as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 1000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExTLdetallesdeordenes
source(output(
		PK_Producto as integer,
		Producto_ID as integer,
		Descripcion_Subcategoria as string,
		Numero_Producto as string,
		Categoria_ID as string,
		Nombre_Producto as string,
		Descripcion_Categoria as string,
		Subcategoria_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Producto
source(output(
		PK_Order as integer,
		num_order as integer,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		imp_subtotal as decimal(18,2),
		id_modo as integer,
		modo_envio as string,
		ID_Tipo_envio as integer,
		descripcion_envio as string,
		Region_ID as integer,
		Region_descripcion as string,
		Detalle_Region as string,
		PK_Cliente as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Ordenes
Select3 keyGenerate(output(PK_detalledeordenes as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(!isNull(PK_Producto) && !isNull(PK_Order) && (Cantidad>0 && !isNull(Cantidad))) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 filter(isNull(PK_Producto) || isNull(PK_Order) || (Cantidad>0 || !isNull(Cantidad))) ~> Filter2
ExTLdetallesdeordenes derive(Precio_Total = {Precio Unitario}*Cantidad,
		{Numero Orden B} = toInteger({Numero Orden})) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, Select1 join({Producto ID} == Producto_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Producto select(mapColumn(
		PK_Producto,
		Producto_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join1, Select2 join({Numero Orden B} == num_order,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Ordenes select(mapColumn(
		PK_Order,
		num_order
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		{Detalle Orden},
		{Producto ID},
		{Linea Total},
		Cantidad,
		Descuento,
		{Precio Unitario},
		Ganancia,
		Precio_Total,
		PK_Producto,
		PK_Order
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		PK_DetalleOrden as integer,
		PK_Order as integer,
		Detalle_Orden as string,
		Linea_Total as double,
		Cantidad as decimal(18,5),
		Descuento as decimal(5,5),
		Precio_Unitario as decimal(18,5),
		Precio_Total as decimal(18,5),
		Ganancia as decimal(18,5),
		PK_Producto as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Delete from DIM_detalle_ordenes;'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_DetalleOrden = PK_detalledeordenes,
		PK_Order,
		Detalle_Orden = {Detalle Orden},
		Linea_Total = {Linea Total},
		Cantidad,
		Descuento,
		Precio_Unitario = Precio_Total,
		Precio_Total,
		Ganancia,
		PK_Producto
	)) ~> Almacenarproducto
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_DetalleOrden as string,
		PK_Order as string,
		Detalle_Orden as string,
		Linea_Total as string,
		Cantidad as string,
		Descuento as string,
		Precio_Unitario as string,
		Precio_Total as string,
		Ganancia as string,
		PK_Producto as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_DetalleOrden = PK_detalledeordenes,
		PK_Order,
		Detalle_Orden = {Detalle Orden},
		Linea_Total = {Linea Total},
		Cantidad,
		Descuento,
		Precio_Unitario = {Precio Unitario},
		Precio_Total,
		Ganancia,
		PK_Producto
	)) ~> Orphans
